mapper.select: SELECT count(*) From RESERVATION WHERE ofNo = #{ofNo} AND bookDate = #{bookDate}

SELECT r.resNo AS resNo, m.muId AS muId, o.ofNo AS ofNo, m.muName AS muName, o.ofName AS ofName, o.repName AS repName, o.ofPrice AS ofPrice, r.bookDate FROM Mu_Office o, RESERVATION r, Mu_Member m WHERE m.muId = r.muId AND o.ofNo = r.ofNo AND r.muId = #{muId} ORDER BY r.bookDate
